name: Pumpkin Carving Simulator
description:
WASD for movement

Left Click to Carve

Esc for pause menu, in order to restart or to quit the game

Very very basic, but cozy, simulation game. Carve pumpkins one spherical chunk at a time and enjoy some relaxing music and the sounds of a park. Be sure to screenshot your pumpkins!

Dynamic Destruction Plugin by toadile-gd

https://github.com/toadile-gd/godot-destructible-body

Gravel Texture

https://www.cgtrader.com/items/2837698/download-page
